name: @xemvuisamda/tiktok-scraper
description: Scrape TikTok product details using Selenium and Playwright
author: enZo

scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget unzip libnss3 fonts-liberation libappindicator3-1 libxss1 xdg-utils google-chrome-stable && npx chromedriver --install
